name: Tianshang
description:
Made in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam 2021!

Theme: "Joined Together"

(Note: The WebGL version works, but the colors are off.
For a better visual experience, please use the downloadable version.)

Thank you for playing! Please let us know what you think, we appreciate all feedback!


Instructions:
  • You control two koi fish simultaneously, representing Yin and Yang!
  • Use the mouse to move.
  • Your fish will automatically turn and swim towards your cursor.
  • The other fish will swim in the opposite direction.
  • Being in contact with enemies of the element as you is harmless.
  • Colliding with enemies of the opposite element ends the game!
  • Build momentum and use your swords to defeat your enemies.
  • Gain as high a score as possible!
Credits:

Jani Gröhn - Design, music and SFX, some 3D assets (arena, sword)

Jimi Vihinen - Coding

Danil Kuydunen - 3D art and animations (koi fish, herons)

(All of the game's assets were custom created by us during the jam weekend.)
